AND T1.USER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{schValue},'%')
AND T1.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{schValue},'%')

SELECT A.AUTHORITY, U.USER_ID, U.USER_NAME, U.EMAIL, U.DIVISION, U.ENABLED, U.DEFAULT_TAB, /* 2018-08-14 choye 추가 */ U.DEFAULT_LOCALE, U.USE_YN, U.CREATED_DATE, U.TOKEN, DATE_FORMAT(U.EXPIRE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS EXPIRE_DATE FROM T2_USERS U INNER JOIN (SELECT AUTHORITY , USER_ID FROM T2_AUTHORITIES
WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} LIMIT 1
) A ON U.USER_ID=A.USER_ID INNER JOIN T2_ROLES R ON A.AUTHORITY = R.AUTHORITY
WHERE U.TOKEN = #{token} AND DATEDIFF(U.EXPIRE_DATE, NOW()) >= 0
